short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color code and group your tweets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instructions: Hover over a tweet and press a number key on the keyboard.  The numbers 1-9 are each assigned a different color.

For example: if I hover over @HackerNewsYC and press 1, all Hacker News tweets will be highlighted red.  Press 1 again to toggle the highlighing off.

-=Updates=-

v1.3 - Now pressing the number 0 or clicking the bird toggles highlighting.
v1.2 - You can now turn the app on and off by clicking the bird in the omnibar.

Like it? Fork it: https://github.com/alexmarchant/chromatweet

Icon modified from: http://findicons.com/icon/47104/bird?id=327329
